Defects.Description: Shortest path algorithm used to determine flight routes not reliably using the true shortest paths.
Steps_to_reproduce: Run shortest path algorithm on airports.
Algorithm output distances do not align with manual calculations.

Defects.Description: Script to calculate flight demand is wildly inflated.
Steps_to_reproduce: Run script to calculate flight demand.
Perform flight demand calculations by hand.
Observe difference in script output and manual calculations.
Defects.Comments: A developer was using incorrect base data.

Defects.Description: Scripts (flight_demand.csv, flight_fuel_capacity.csv, and flight_profit_loss.csv) calculate inaccurate data.
Defects.Comments: Converted distance in flight_demand.csv, flight_fuel_capacity.csv, and flight_profit_loss.csv to weighted distance. Added percent full for possible number of plane per day.

Defects.Description: Script to create the database does not complete execution.
Steps_to_reproduce: Program fails execution, noting it was unable to connect to the docker.
Defects.Comments: Incorrect usage of the dockers and incorrect IP used in the script.

Defects.Description: Aircraft object not initializing properly, causing TypeError exceptions during simulation startup.
Steps_to_reproduce: Simulation crashes with a TypeError returned.
Defects.Comments: Added type-checking to Aircraft class constructor.

Defects.Description: Docker application crashes due to ports.
Defects.Comments: Updated application port exposed by docker from 8000 to 32000 because 8000 is reserved by Apple on Macs, which causes the application to crash.

Defects.Description: Aircraft class constructor can be provided impossible fuel levels.
Steps_to_reproduce: Initialize an aircraft with a fuel level less than 0 or greater than its capacity.
Defects.Comments: Updated class constructor to include error checking.

Defects.Description: Aircraft maintenance object not triggering maintenance tasks.
Steps_to_reproduce: Aircraft maintenance hours are way above 200.
Defects.Comments: There was no check for maintenance hours, added.

Defects.Description: Route object storing NULL destinations, leading to incorrect flight paths in the simulation.
Steps_to_reproduce: Simulation output lists NULL destination for some flights.
Defects.Comments: Added TypeError checking and NULL exception handling in class constructor.

Defects.Description: Flight scheduling object not considering airport curfew times.
Route module does not accurately track flight demand for a given flight.
Steps_to_reproduce: Note demand for a flight for each airport/aircraft in the log.
Observe that passenger count is not accurate over each day.
Defects.Comments: Separated flight demand variable into two: current, daily demand. Script now resets current demand to daily demand after each day.

Defects.Description: Flight module does not include expected/actual arrival times.
Steps_to_reproduce: Observe that the flight module does not keep track of the expected/actual times.
Defects.Comments: Added four respective data members initialized to None, and update after flight has landed.

Steps_to_reproduce: Simulation is still running after 700 minutes.
Defects.Comments: For lambda functions, instead of creating a filter object and then casting it to a list object, create only a single list via conditional construction.

Steps_to_reproduce: Observe the reports folder is empty.
Defects.Comments: Folder was mis-named, renamed to correct name.

Defects.Description: Incorrect departure time displayed in flight details.
Steps_to_reproduce: Displayed departure time does not match the scheduled departure time.
Defects.Comments: Updated the flight details retrieval function to display the correct departure time.

Defects.Description: Passenger cannot purchase ticket if special characters are used in name fields.
Steps_to_reproduce: Login using a special character in the name field.

Defects.Description: Error occurs when attempting to cancel a flight reservation.
Steps_to_reproduce: Search for and purchase a flight.
Navigate to your trips, select your ticket, and click 'Cancel flight.'

Defects.Description: Simulation output lists flight number as tail number.
Steps_to_reproduce: Aircraft tail number shows aircraft flight number.
